conversion_verification.notes: Second image is essentially the same 2D floor plan tilted in perspective with drop shadow; it lacks true vertical wall extrusion and room volume (no perceivable wall height, no top+side wall faces forming interior spaces).

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Automatic rejection (E0-FATAL): no true 3D wall height/room volume; looks like a perspective-styled 2D plan.

detected_errors.description: Not a true 3D conversion: walls are not modeled with real height and interior volume; output is a 2D floor plan presented at an angle.

summary: The second image is a perspective-styled 2D floor plan rather than a geometrically faithful 3D cutaway model with wall height and interior volume.
